title: Add Cash App donation line to global footer

requirements.summary: Add a centered donation line with the exact Cash App handle “$WOTWM” beneath the existing YouTube subscription line in the global footer.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a donation line on all pages/sections where the footer is shown.
The donation line includes the exact text “$WOTWM” (including the leading $).
The footer layout remains readable and centered on both mobile and desktop (no overflow or broken spacing).

file_operations.description: Insert a new, clearly worded donation line (e.g., “Donate: Cash App $WOTWM”) directly beneath the existing YouTube subscription line, keeping the footer’s centered layout and responsive spacing consistent with the current Tailwind styling.
